card.name: Adena
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mispír if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Men (+1), all others (-2), Clans of the Drêl (+2 if controlled by you), Clans of the Pel (+2 +2 if contolled by you)

attr.value: Contains a hoard. Animal and drake creatures keyable to Coastal Sea [c] may be keyed to this site. Any sage may play Eyes of Mandos at this site (as if Pallando).
Contains a hoard. Animal and drake creatures keyable to Coastal Sea [c] may be keyed to this site.

card.name: Ally of the Black Land
card.text: Playable if you have either Open Alliance in play or receive the mp from a Secret alliance in play. You are considered a minion player for all aspects of the game. You can win the game by taking The One Ring to Dol Guldur or Barad-dûr. You cannot play any further hero resources or hero characters. Cannot be duplicated on a given player. You may search for this card if Cast from the Order was played on you.

attr.value: Men - Each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment)
Port. A company moving to this site may tap a diplomat to use Bridge as if it was a Haven [H].
Men — Each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Port. A company moving to this site may tap a diplomat to use Forched March as if it was a Darkhaven [K].

card.name: Araphor
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. Can use spirit-magic. +2 EI against character and factions playable at sites in Mirëdor. Against Nazgul, +3 to her prowess, and his body is halved (round up).

attr.value: Barrow-wight may be keyed to this site. If the Undead attack was defeated this site contains a hoard till the end of the turn.
Barrow-wight may be keyed to this site. If the Undead attack was defeated this site contains a hoard till the end of the turn.

card.name: Armada of the Mornaturi
card.text: Playable at any non-Elf-hold Port outside of Greater Gondor, if you have 5 factions playable at a Ports at the site.

attr.value: Port. If an animal ally is played at this site, opponent may take a disease hazard from his discard pile to his hand.
Men — 5 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

Port. If an animal ally is played at this site, opponent may take a disease hazard from his discard pile to his hand. Any agent with a home site in the Dominions of the Seven may come into play at this site.

card.name: Arthrazoc
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +1 EI against characters and factions playable at sites in Pel. May use Persuasive Words against any influence attempt he makes; if successful shuffle Persuasive Words into your deck, instead of discarding it.

attr.value: Items (minor, major, greater*, gold ring) *non-battle-gear item only
(1st) Traps — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess; (2nd) opponent may play any non-unique undead creature from hand, or siteboard as a 2nd automatic attack.
Men — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company contains no Magri characters)
Men — 4 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company contains no Magri characters or overt characters)
Port-on-Aronduin. The King's Men faction is playable at this site.
Port-on-Aronduin. *Any gold ring item is playable here. The King's Men faction is playable at this site.

* Discard either food item from the company or a resource card from your hand to make items playable here this turn. If you discard both a food item and a resource from your hand, this site contains a hoard till the end of the turn.
Dwarves — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
The first item played by a covert company does not tap the site, if the company discards a food item it controls.

card.name: Chailla
card.text: Unique. Playable at Emyn Din if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: any overt faction you have in play in the Dominions of the Seven (-3) tap if you defeat a creature attack without an asterisk (*) keyed to the any region in the Uttersouth, to take a ranger resource or a card playable at any Hidden Site in The Uttersouth from your discard pile or deck to your hand.

card.name: Clans of the Drêl
card.text: Playable at any Border-hold [B], Free-hold [F] or Shadow-hold [S] in Drêl, where no other factions is in play, if the influence check is greater than 8.Standort Modifications: Dwarves (+1), Elves (+2), overt characters (-4), Adena (+1), Clans of the Drêl (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Clans of the Pel (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Sanâr (-3), Sederi (-2). This faction is worth 1 mp for each copy of Clans of the Drêl you have in active play.Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Clans of the Pel
card.text: Playable at any Border-hold [B], Free-hold [F] or Shadow-hold [S] in Pel, where no other factions is in play, if the influence check is greater than 8.Standort Modifications: Dwarves (+2), Elves (-1), overt characters (-4), Adena (+1), Clans of the Drêl (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Clans of the Pel (+2 if controlled by a hero player, -2 if controlled by a minion player), Magri (-3), Sederi (-2). This faction is worth 1 mp for each copy of Clans of the Pel you have in active play.Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: Traps —each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (detainment using his mind value)

Hidden Site. Tap an Elf or an Valdacli-lord when this site card is revealed. Characters may tap to remove corruption cards during the site phase with +2 to the removal roll (if they have not attempted to remove the card before
Traps — each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (using his mind value); the prowess is 10 against over companies.
Hidden Site. Discard a stolen knowledge from the company when this site is revealed. The first information resource played at this site does not tap it.

card.name: Cuind
card.text: Unique. Playable at Valagalen if the influence check is greater than 8. Standort Modifications: Silvan (+2), Nando (+1), Sinda (-2), Noldo (-2) Khelno (-2)Tap this faction to let a resource targeting a wilderness [w] target a jungle [j] instead.

card.name: Daroc
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. Leader. +2 EI against Dwarves. Unless he controls a horse ally, his company may normally move only 3 regions. For influencing factions or characters he is also considered a diplomat. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in The Uttersouth.

card.name: Derei
card.text: Unique. Pel. +4 EI against The Society of Derei faction. tap to discard Warders of the Night or to prevent it from being discarded during opponent's turn.

card.name: Dom
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +1 EI against Dwarves. +1 CEI against Stiffbeard Dwarves. +2 against Dwarf factions playable in The Sunlands or The Uttersouth.

card.name: Dwarves of Blackflame
card.text: Unique. Playable at Baruzimabûl, if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+1), Stiffbeard Dwarves (+1), Valdacli Lord (+3) tap and discard a food item you control, to place a non-hoard, non-unique battle-gear item with any site Dúnadan-hold or Man-hold where you have a faction in play, the item is considered stored at the site.

attr.value: Traps — Swamp Gas - each character faces a strike with 5 prowess

Swamp. Any non-unique animal faction is playable here. If Beast of the Woods is played here, keep this card with the faction, for this version of the faction the cancelling ability works for Elorna and its adjacent non-Coastal Sea regions.

Swamp. Any non-unique animal faction is playable here. If Beast of the Woods is played here, keep this card with the faction, for this version of the faction the cancelling ability works for Elorna and its adjacent non-Coastal Sea regions.

card.name: Emchangodogo
card.text: Unique. Drake. 3 strikes. As a creature may be played at Tomb-fields of Makaburini. If Doors of Night is in play may also be played keyed to Hyarn, Mag, Miredor, Pel, Tumag, Yellow Mountains - Western Spur, or keyed to non-Free-hold, non- Haven sites in these regions. As a long-event any company moving in one of the above regions faces an attack by Enchangodogo for which the attack receives -2 prowess, -1 body, but an additional strike.

attr.value: Hidden Site. Discard a Lost Knowledge (from the company) or tap Wose character (within the company) or Wose faction you control when this site is revealed.
Woses — 3 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Hidden Site. Discard a Lost Knowledge (from the company) or tap Wose character (within the company) or Wose faction you control when this site is revealed.
Hidden Site. Tap a scout when this site is revealed. Information is only playable if you ´rescued´ a prisoner at this site this turn.

Hidden Site. Tap a scout when this site is revealed. Information is only playable if you control a unique minion faction within the Dominions of the Seven, in which case the automatic-attack is detainment against your companies.

card.name: Farijin (Gettaniyan)
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non port site in Tulwang or Zajantak if you discard a treasure item from the company if the influence check is greater then 7.tap cancel any non-unique creature attack keyed to Curinshiban, Tulwang or Zajantak keyed to the region by type or name.

card.name: Frôr V
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +1 prowess against Drakes. +2 EI against Stiffbeard Dwarves. -1 to his CP. -2 CP if character with higher mind is in his company.

card.name: Háin
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. Leader. +1 prowess while at or moving to an Under-deeps site. +1 to his CC while at an Under-deeps site. -1 to all his rolls if Gates of Morning is in play.

attr.value: Dreams of Lore can be stored at this site as if a Haven [H]. Keepers of the True Flame is playable on any sage who stored a Dreams of Lore at this site this turn and may be taken directly from your sideboard.
Men - 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against covert Blackplayer's companies)

Any Prisoner (character or resource) can be stored at this site as if a Darkhaven [K]. Keepers of the True Flame is playable on any sage whose stored a a Prisoner at this site this turn and may be taken directly from your sideboard.

card.name: Hargrog
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Leader. +2 EI against orcs, trolls and characters (or factions playable) in the Uttersouth. If you have him in your starting company you must start the game at his home site and you may include slayer characters in your starting company and deck.

card.name: Hembur
card.text: Unique.+4 EI against The Monks of Mor Tarain faction. When using Desert Amber targets heal to untapped instead of just tapped. May use Herblore as if Radagast if moving through a Desert [e] (as if a Wilderness [w]).

card.name: Imrazôr III
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +2 EI against characters and factions playable at sites in Elorna. tap Imrazôr III during your end-of-turn phase and discard a diplomat only resource from your hand to shuffle any other diplomat only resource from your discard pile to your deck.

attr.value: Port. Foliant of Warfare is playable at the site by a diplomat.

card.name: Karaag the Gnome
card.text: Unique. Drêl. Karaag the Gnome is considered a Dwarf for Dwarven Cunning and Dwarven Fire. If he bears a technology item, you may play Concealed Entrance as if a scout, or Ready to His Will (as if a minion) and even on a Pûkel-creature attack (regardless of its numbers of strikes).

card.name: Magri
card.text: Playable at any site in Mag or Tumag if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1), Dwarves (-3), Elves (-2), Men (+1), Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.text: Unique. Warlord. Leader. May tap to cancel a demon or undead attack against his company. +3 EI against Men and Orcs. Your companies may .... You receive....

card.name: Men of Ciryatanírë
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lond Anarion if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+2), Army of the Southern Dragon in play (+2 if by an opponent; -4 if by you). This faction is considered a Dúnadan faction if opponent controls no copy of The King's Men. This factions is worth 4 mp to a Black player.

card.name: Men of Mirëdor
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ostelor if the influence it greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+2),Elves (+2), Men (-2), an avatar (-3), any overt character (-5). This faction is effected by Sentinels of Númenór and/or Alliance of Free Peoples as if it where a Man faction. This faction is worth 5 mp to non-hero player.

card.name: Men of Sûlcoron
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tol Turgul if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1) tap make either Sons of Kings keyable to any region in the Dominions of the Seven, or to have any Free-hold [F] and Border-hold [B] site in the Dominions of the Seven be effected by Beacons Alight. This faction is worth an additional mp (to a maximum of 3) for each character eliminated by Sons of Kings keyed to a region within the Dominions of the Seven.

attr.value: Port. A character with a port as a home site may tap to make one food items playable from your discard pile.

Port. A character with a port as a home site may tap to make one food items playable from your discard pile. Any agent with a home site in the Dominions of the Seven may come into play at this site.

card.name: Nandran
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non-Haven site in Elorna or Hyarn if the influence check is greater than 6. Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (-2), Sânar (-2), Dwarves of Mablad-dûm (+2), any other faction in play at this site (-2). tap cancel an attack keyed to Elorna or Hyarn (by name and type) or cancel an environment short-event played on a company moving through these to regions.

card.name: Níocúpa
card.text: Unique. Drake. 3 strikes. As a creature may be played at Three Sisters . If Doors of Night is in play may also be played keyed to Pel Bight and all its adjacent regions or keyed to non-Free- hold, non-Haven sites in these regions. As a long-event any company moving in one of the above regions faces an attack by Níocúpa for which the attack receives -2 prowess, -1 body, but an additional strike.

card.name: Open Alliance
card.text: You may play a Valdacli lord at his home site (or in your starting company, you must start the game at his home site). If you have not yet revealed an avatar he may only come into play in the Dominions of the Seven (or its adjacent territories). You receive this card’s mp if you have a faction host of 5 or more factions under the control of the Valdacli lord at your avatar’s Haven site [H].

attr.value: Port. If any version this site turns into a Border-hold [B], the automatic-attack type is also considered Men. *Contains a hoard if the company discards a Information card it controls.

Port. If any version this site turns into a Border-hold [B], the automatic-attack type is also considered Men. *Contains a hoard if the company discards a Information card it controls.

card.name: Pharacas
card.text: Unique. Black player only. +2 EI against Dúnadan characters and factions playable in the Sunlands.

card.name: Phorakôn
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +2 prowess against magic users. Phorakôn is considered a sage for every item he bears. +2 EI against Men of Sûlcoron faction. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in The Uttersouth.

card.name: Princedom of Mirëdor
card.text: Playable on a Valdacli lord . If bearer controls another Valdacli under his EI, and you control a faction for each of their home sites, you may tap either to cancel an attack against their company within the Dominions of the Seven. You receive this card's mp if you have either 3 factions in play at battle-ground sites within The Uttersouth or if you besiege at least 3 sites where an opponent's faction(s) are present. Discard this card if a minion faction host enters any of your above mentioned sites. Cannot be duplicated on a given Valdacli or a given factions.

attr.value: (1st) Rock Fall - Each character faces a strike with 6 prowess; (2nd) Drake - 1 strike with 10 prowess
Any non-unique drake not playable keyed by region symbol can be keyed to this site. The first ore played at this site does not tap the site.
Port. If any version this site turns into a Free-hold [F], the automatic-attack type is also considered Dúnedain. *If a Free-hold this site contains a hoard.
Men — 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Port. If this site turns into a Free-hold [F], the automatic-attack type is also considered Dúnedain. *If a Free-hold this site contains a hoard.

card.name: Sakulbâr II
card.text: Unique. Valdacli. +1 EI against Dúnedain. +2 EI against factions playable at his home sites. Cannot be a starting character unless you start at a site in the Dominion of the Seven or The Sunlands. If he becomes a leader he gains the diplomat skill. Unless under the control of an avatar, leader or valdacli, all his CP are modified by -1.

card.name: Sanâr
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Oasis site in Tulwang or Curinshiban if the influence check is greater than 8.Standart modifcations: Etulians (-2), Farijin (-2), Nandran (-2)Something with sacrificing prisoners taken at this site, and if doing so bringing a Were-worm back to hand

card.name: Secret Alliance
card.text: Playable if you do not have agents for more than 18 mind revealed. Place one Valdacli Lord (which is not in play as another player's avatar) (do not reveal him) face down with this card and a face down home site. He now acts as a dual agent. When the associated agent is revealed an avatar controlling the Valdacli Lord as a character must make a CP -3. You may tap your avatar (a manifestation of The Lidless Eye may always tap) if in the same territory as the agent to modify any roll by it by +2 (even during opponent's turn). You must make a CP -3 if associated agent is eliminated. You receives this card's mp if this agents action discard or eliminate an opponent's character, faction or item.

card.name: Sederi
card.text: Playble at any site in Hyarn, Drêl, Elorna or Pel if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Sederi (+2), any other man faction in play at their playable site (-3) This faction is worth 1 mp for every copy of Sederi in play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Seregul
card.text: Unique. Valdacli Lord. +2 prowess against Animals and Orcs. Any Noble Hound under his control receives +1 prowess and +1 body.

attr.value: Hidden Site. Tap a scout in the company when this site is revealed.
Hidden Site. Tap a scout in the company when this site is revealed.

card.name: Slow-fang
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. +1 to all body checks against hobbit, orcs and wose characters. You may play Venomous Sting (from your hand or your discard pile) on any character wounded by Slow-fang. May also be played keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R] in any Jungle [j].

card.name: Slûcrac
card.text: Unique. Adena. Agent. Slayer. May tap to attack with an extra stike in CvCC or as an agent. May not tap for any influence attempt. During your end-of-turn phase a token on him if face up (or if a character); if there are more tokens than his mind stat, discard Slûcrac, remove a token any time he faces a non-detainment strike. Agent only: chooses defending characters.

card.name: Southern Slayer
card.text: Slayer. 1 strike. Strikes from Southern Slayer cannot be cancelled; +2 prowess and + 1 strikes for every slayer creature in opponent's mp or slayer trophy in defending company. All strikes target the same character in separate strike sequences. Playable keyed to Jungle [j] or Border-land [b], if opponent's company includes a character with a home site in The Sunlands or The Uttersouth. May also be played keyed to Border-hold [B] or non-Hidden Ruins & Lairs [R] within these territories.

card.name: Terilaen
card.text: Unique. Silvan. +1 EI against Silvan elves. +2 EI against Cuind faction. tap at Valagalen and discard a ritual from your hand for no effect, to make a roll, you may look at up to the number of cards from the top of your deck equal to your roll and place them in any order you choose; Terilaen makes a CC modified by half the number of cards (round down).

card.name: The Black Dogs
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped Dúnadan-hold or Man-hold in the Dominions of the Seven, if the influence check is greater than 7. Standard Modifications: Those with the Black Hand (+2), any treasure item the company discards to influence this faction (+2). tap key any one slayer creature to any site in the same or adjacent region, where you have this faction in play. If a character is eliminated by this slayer creature, play the character in your mp with this faction; you receive the characters kill points and this faction is now worth 1 mp

card.name: The Council of the Seven
card.text: Playable with your starting company if start at a site in the Dominion of the Seven (your opponent may take up to 3 Valdicli Lord characters from his sideboard and shuffle them into his deck). Each Valdacli may tap during your end-of-turn phase to set aside a number of cards equal to its mind stat (minus opponent's free GI), and place them onto your play deck in any order you choose. If at least 4 Valdacli Lords tap simultaneously you must reveal all cards set aside to be allowed to switch up to 4 cards with 4 cards of the same type from your sideboard. Discard this card in a you ever control less Valdacli Lords than all opponents combined.

card.name: The Eyes of Malezar
card.text: Unique. Playable at Kondu Manara (or any site with Warlord's lair on it if you are Malezar) if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Malezar +3, remove a prisoner or a trophy from the company to add twice the mp the prisoner or trophy is worth. tap allow Vampire to be keyed to any site where you have a minion agent in play.

card.name: The Knifeless Ones
card.text: Slayer. 3 strikes. Playable keyed to any Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] in the Dominions of the Seven against non-Black player's companies. If XXX is in play, The Knifeless Ones, may also be keyed to any regions within the Dominion of the Seven or to Border-holds [B] or Shadow-holds in any of its adjacent regions. If keyed to Border-hold [B] or region any scout or ranger in the company may tap to cancel a strike from this attack. Discard any men or wolf creature from your hand (not counting against hazard limit) to add that creature's type to this slayer attack.

card.name: The Monks of Ereg Eiren
card.text: Unique. Playable at Eregost if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (-2), Dúnedain (-2), Elves (-4), Ringrwraith (+3). tap to either increase the hazard limit against an non-Black player opponent's company traveling in The Uttersouth by +1, or to bring any The Knifeless Ones creature from your discard pile to your deck.

card.name: The Monks of Mor Tarain
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Dúnadan-hold or Man-hold in the Dominion of the Seven, if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: For every defeated creature without an asterisk [*] in your mp (+1), if you discard Praise to Elbereth from your hand (+4). As a creature costing 2 against the hazard limit playable from mp against a minion company moving within the Dominion of the Seven. Men. 3 strikes with 10 prowess (body 5) (+3 prowess against Ringwraiths, Spawn, Demon and Magic users). If not defeated return to the mp; if an opponent's character was eliminated by The Monks of Mor Tarain, they are now worth 3 mp.

card.name: The Society of Derei
card.text: Unique. Playable at Arpel if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+1), Elves (-2) Men (+1). This faction is worth 3 mp if placed under Profitable Trade or if Arpel is used as a site for a hazard host card for a prisoner.

card.name: The Southern Slayers
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tower of Hargrog, if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Leader (+2), Warlord (+2), Ringwraith (+2). tap make Creature of an Older World playable at Tower of Hargrog by any slayer or Ringwraith character. This faction is worth an additional mp (to a maximum of 4) for each character eliminted by either one of your slayer creatures or characters.

card.name: Those with the Black Hand
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Man-hold in the Dominion of the Seven if you discard a Lost or Stolen Knowledge from the company if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Ringwraith (+3), hero faction in play at any version of the site (-3), minion faction in play at this site (-2), for each treasure the company discards (+2). tap at any time to place Venomous Sting on a character just wounded by Slayer creature keyed to the Dominion of the Seven or its adjacent territories.

attr.value: A company at this site may play hoard items at this site if it has faced an attack by Níocúpa this turn. Valour in Battle may be played at this site without further requirements.
A company at this site may play hoard items and/or Perfect Gold Ring at this site if it has faced an attack by Níocúpa this turn.
Dúnedain — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if company contains a Dúnadan or Elf)
If you tap a diplomat and a sage at this site, one Await the Advent of Allies or one Far-sight may be shuffled from your discard pile into your play deck.
Information, Items (minor, major, greater*, gold ring*)
(1st) Dúnedain — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess; (2nd) Dúnedain — 1 strike with 14 prowess (only against an avatar's or overt company)
*May only be played by an avatar's or overt company. An overt company must tap a character when this site is revealed.
Mag. A company at this site may play non-unique hoard items at this site if it has faced an attack by Emchangodogo this turn.

Mag. A company at this site may play non- unique hoard items at this site if it has faced an attack by Emchangodogo this turn. If a company moving to this site is allowed to move through a mountain region, the site path from Tower of Hargrog is only one Wilderness [w].
Hidden Site. You must discard a Stolen Knowledge when this site is revealed. *May also be a non-unique hoard item.
s j j j w w

Only characters with a home site in The Uttersouth may be brought into play at this site. Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). Counts as a Shadow-hold [S] for the purpose of playing and interpreting hazards.

card.name: Ulrith
card.text: Unique. Kirani. Agent. Slayer. Can use shadow-magic. using poison and whatnot

card.name: Union of the Valdacli
card.text: Playable if you have at least 4 Valdacli in active play. Your Dúnedain and Men factions within the Dominions of the Seven are effected by Alliance of the Free Peoples. This card is worth 1 mp (to a maximum of 4) for every race of which you control at least 2 characters and a faction playable at sites within the Dominions of the Seven. Discard this card if you the requirements to play are not met, or if a minion faction moves into the territory of the Dominions of the Seven. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: An elf or maia/wizard sage may tap at this site to play Show Things Unbidden (as if Galadriel at Lórien), afterwards the character makes a CP modified by -11 plus his mind stat (10 for a wizard).
(1st) Elves — Each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Awakend Plants — 4 strikes with 11 prowess (against overt companies only)

Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site, unless your Ringwraith has a home site in The Sunlands or The Uttersouth.

card.name: Warders of the Night
card.text: All Men creature attacks in the Dominion of the Seven, can be used to not harm defending characters (hazard's players choice). Any successful strike does not wound the defending character; rather he must place one item he bears (attacker's choice) `off to the side´ with this card, which then remains in play till no items are attached to it. Items placed with this card are considered playable at the any Man-hold within 2 regions away of the companies site of origin. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: Hidden Site. tap a sage or diplomat with a home site in the Dominions of the Seven, when this site card is revealed
